properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 20 at 7:22AM CST until February 23 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Louisiana...

Tensas River At Tendal affecting Madison Parish
Bayou Macon Near Como affecting Franklin Parish

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Tensas River At Tendal
* until late Saturday night.
* At  6:30 AM Thursday the stage was 25.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 25.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 25.5 feet this
evening.
* Impact...At 25.0 feet...Several thousand acres of agricultural and
farmland become inundated.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.

Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
